H0.text: which river separates the bronx in new york city from manhattan island. Hudson River

H1.text: which river separates the bronx in new york city from manhattan island. East River

H2.text: which river separates the bronx in new york city from manhattan island. Bronx Kill

H3.text: which river separates the bronx in new york city from manhattan island. Harlem River

A4.text: It separates the Bronx from Randalls Island.

A5.text: The East River separates Long Island, with the boroughs of Brooklyn and Queens, from Manhattan Island, and from the Bronx on the North American mainland.

A6.text: The Bronx Kill joins the East River north of Randalls Island.
